column5: Is there a bank before crossing the border to exchange money without a surcharge?Thanks.
Any of the Banks in Sault, MI will exchange your US currency for Canadian currency with no surcharge. You might want to go to Vegas Kewadin Casino though as they are giving the best rate right now.
Using a VISA for cash advance is the best way to get the most accurate exchange rate for your money.I recommend using your VISA on gas or other items that do not require cash up-front.
